_header: Sir John Sinclair be goeth to dance
Title(s): ‘Of a dance in the quenis chalmer’
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Of a dance in the quenis chalmer’ — seven 7-line stanzas

CULLl510.First Lines:
Schir Johne Sinclair begowth to danceffor he was new cum owt of
                    ffrance…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…He stickit lyk ane tyk sum saidAne mirrier dance mycht na man
                    se

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Schir Ihon sinclair begowthe to dancefor he was new cum owt of
                    france…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…he stinckett lyk a tuk sum saeda mirrear dance mycht na man
                    see
CamMagPep2553.Attributed Author: quod dunbar of a dance in þe que[nis] chalmer (p. 341)
